body: Is there an use case for this?

:-1: Out of scope for this project. We had this discussion last night.

On 2015-08-19, at 2:27 AM, "Guido L." notifications@github.com wrote:

> i have a branch for installShield Cabinet files for extracting listing and content of them.
> I also planed when #9093 is merged to implement function like:
> 
> Handle (when support is given) microsoft cabinet files
> index per filename lookup and viceversa
> extract files by index or name
> extract an entire Directory
